entry.title: Purple Grape Collagen Powder - 560g
entry.summary:
Vendor: thecollagen.co
Type:
Price: 79.00

Description

Bursting with the juicy, vibrant taste of fresh purple grapes, it’s the perfect refreshment to energise your day while supporting your glow goals. Packed with powerful beauty benefits, this collagen powder is more than a drink—it’s your daily boost for radiant skin, strong nails, healthy hair, and happy joints!

Benefits

Consider all your beauty and wellness needs taken care of. 

With 15 grams of heavy-hitting Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides per serving, our collagen powder — pure, 100% grass-fed, and pasture-raised — is not here to mess around. 

Scientifically formulated for fast absorption, our Premium Collagen Peptides work quickly to support hair, nail, and skin health; improve joint function; and nourish the gut.

Other youth-preserving ingredients include: 

  • Vitamin C (adored for its ability to boost natural collagen production)
  • Hyaluronic Acid (a humectant that attracts and retains moisture for joint lubrication and plumped-up skin)
  • Biotin (a B vitamin crucial for energy production and, thus, healthy hair, skin, and nails)

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin  (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins. 

  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

Nutrition Information

Amino Acid Profile

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 400ml hot or cold water, fruit or your favourite smoothie and mix well. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better.

How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

How many serves per pack?

Each tin provides 28 servings, equivalent to 56 scoops, ensuring long-lasting use. If you consume once per day it will last you 28 days. Prepare to be amazed as each serving contains an impressive 15 grams of collagen, complemented by the benefits of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and Biotin. This comprehensive blend offers everything you need to enhance your beauty regimen, providing nourishment and support for radiant skin, hair, and nails, joints and gut health.

How much sugar per serve?

Indulge guilt-free in our Premium Collagen Peptides and our entire product range, as each serving is thoughtfully crafted to contain minimal to no sugar. Enjoy the delicious flavours of our Premium Collagen Peptides, knowing that each one contains less than 1g of sugar per serving, allowing you to prioritise your health and wellness without sacrificing taste.

entry.title: Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens - 308g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 65.00

Description

Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens takes the fuss (and chewing) out of wellness. 

It's a fully loaded daily greens powder designed to give your body what it needs to neutralise toxins, support a strong immune system, optimally absorb nutrients, and refresh tired-looking skin, hair, and nails. 

A single serving of Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens delivers:

  • 5,000mg Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
  • 5 potent toxins-flushing Organic Greens
  • 17 antioxidants-rich Superfoods
  • Natural Sea Mineral Complex to help fill gaps in your diet
  • 6 fatigue-fighting Herbal Extracts
  • 4 good-gut-bacteria-fuelling Prebiotics (5.6 billion CFUs)
  • 5 digestion-supporting Probiotics
  • 5 absorption-enhancing Digestive Enzymes

No artificial flavours. Or sweeteners. Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens brings you all the good stuff without the nasties in every delish, blood-sugar-friendly scoop.

Benefits

Your wellness drawer is about to get a lot neater. 

Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens combines the power of multiple health-beneficial supplements, such as your greens powder, multivitamins, and pre and probiotics. 

Blending 5 Organic Greens, 17 nutrient-dense Superfoods, and Natural Mineral Sea Complex, it helps you cover the nutritional bases your body needs for optimal toxins neutralisation and immune function. 

Another powerhouse ingredient is Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides. These bioactive peptides work to unlock a radiant, firm complexion, rejuvenate nails, and promote stronger, bouncier hair. 

Made to encourage a balanced gut microbiome, Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens brings together Pre and Probiotics and Digestive Enzymes — aiding digestion and supporting the relief of occasional discomforts, such as mild bloating, gas, and diarrhoea. 

Get a smooth boost of natural, sustained energy from 6 Herbal Extracts designed to help you live life to the fullest.

Ingredients

    • Organic Greens Blend (Spirulina, Chlorella, Alfalfa Grass, Wheat Grass, Barley Grass)
      - Spirulina is a blue-green microalgae rich in protein, B vitamins, and antioxidants like phycocyanins.
      - Chlorella is a green algae that contains chlorophyll, which aids detoxification. It's also high in antioxidant compounds, such as carotenoids, like lutein, beta-carotene, and zeaxanthin.
      - Alfalfa Grass has a long history of use as a medicinal herb for humans. It's a good source of calcium, potassium, phosphorus, iron, and vitamins A, C, E, and K.
      - Wheat Grass is a great source of cleansing chlorophyll, vitamins and minerals (vitamins A, B, C, and E, iron, calcium, and magnesium), antioxidant compounds, and bioflavonoids, such as apigenin.
      - Barley Grass is rich in vitamins C, B, and minerals like calcium, iron, and magnesium.

    • 100% Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
      Hydrolysed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2, and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin, and nails, improve joint function, and support gut health.

    • Super Fruit Juice Blend (Blackcurrant, Raspberry, Strawberry, Pomegranate, Blueberry, Cranberry, Elderberry, Acai, Goji)
      These 5 super fruits offer a high concentration of vitamins, minerals, fibre, and antioxidants. 

      Of particular importance for beauty and overall health is vitamin C, which may help protect against oxidative stress by scavenging destructive free radicals and stimulating the body's natural production of collagen, plus hyaluronic acid. 

    • Organic Fruit and Vegetable Blend (Beetroot, Carrot, Kale, Spinach, Acai, Grape, Apple, Broccoli Sprout)
      Eight incredibly nutrient-dense fruits and vegetables with high amounts of essential vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and fibre that you may be missing out on your daily diet. 

      An unfamiliar ingredient that might have caught your eye is Broccoli Sprout — this refers to a 3-5 day-old broccoli seed sprout that offers more nutrition benefits than the mature plant, including increased concentrations of powerful antioxidants like vitamin C and a phytochemical called sulforaphane. 

    • Natural Sea Mineral Complex
      Derived from red marine algae. A rich source of bioavailable calcium and 72 trace minerals, including magnesium, iron, and selenium, Natural Sea Mineral Complex offers a fuss-free way to fill the nutrition gaps in your diet. 

    • Prebiotics (Partially Hydrolysed Guar Gum, Chicory Root Fibre, Acacia Fibre, Organic Green Banana Resistant Starch Powder)
      These 4 prebiotic fibres aren't digestible by your body, so they travel down to your lower digestive tract relatively intact and become a crucial food source for your gut's friendly microorganisms. 

      This encourages a balanced gut microbiome, which promotes an optimal environment for your digestive system and overall health.

    • Probiotics Blend (Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus plantarum, Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Bifidobacterium lactis, Bifidobacterium longum)
      If prebiotics are "fertilisers" for beneficial gut microbes, probiotics are the "seeds" that'll populate your digestive tract and improve the composition of your gut microbiome. 

      Different strains of probiotics perform different biological actions in the gut; the 5 probiotic strains in Super Beauty Greens were specifically selected for their unique and synergistic benefits in supporting overall health, vitality, gut, and immune support. 

    • Digestive Enzyme Blend (Protease, Amylase, Lipase, Cellulase, Lactase)
      A comprehensive blend of 5 digestive enzymes that support good digestion — promoting optimal nutrient absorption while minimising the occasional gas and bloating. 
      - Protease enzymes break down proteins into smaller peptides and amino acids for absorption. 
      - Amylase enzymes break down carbohydrates into simpler sugars like glucose for absorption.
      - Lipase enzymes break down dietary fats into fatty acids and glycerol for absorption.
      - Cellulase enzymes break down cellulose, a plant fibre humans can't digest without assistance.
      - Lactase enzymes break down lactose, the sugar found in dairy products. 

    • Herbal Extract Blend (L-theanine, Panax Ginseng, Cacao Bean Polyphenols, Milk Thistle, Gotu Kola)
      A blend of natural, energising actives that'll have you maintaining peak performance from day to night. Get ready to live your best life.

    Nutritional Information

    How to Use

    Fill your glass or bottle with 250-350ml of cold or hot water.

    Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to the water, and blend well.

    One serving a day is recommended for the best results.

    Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

    Common FAQs

    Can Super Beauty Greens be taken alongside Glow shakes, Premium Collagen Peptides and/or Collagen Dream?

    Absolutely, you can take Super Beauty Greens with Glow shakes and/or Premium Collagen Peptides! All of our collagen products are designed to complement each other.

    • Super Beauty Greens: Boost your fruit and veggie game effortlessly, packed with collagen, Prebiotics, Probiotics, and Digestive Enzymes to keep you light, energised, and bloat-free.

    • Glow Shakes: These shakes are designed to help with weight management, skin health, and overall wellness with 29 grams of protein and collagen peptides.

    • Premium Collagen Peptides: Added skin loving ingredients like hyaluronic acid and supports skin elasticity, hair, nails, and joints.

    • Collagen Dream: Collagen-infused hot chocolate that guides you into a peaceful slumber, and awakens you with revitalised beauty.

    Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

    Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

    For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

    Can I take all the products together? Is there a limit?

    There’s no official limit on collagen intake, so you can enjoy it your way! Our collagen products are made to complement each other, giving you the ultimate glow. If you’re just starting your collagen journey, you may want to start with 1 serving a day and gradually increase as you feel. It’s all about finding your glow-getting groove!

entry.title: Apple Blackcurrant Super Beauty Greens - 308g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 65.00

Description

Eat the rainbow with ease — no farmer's market trip required. 

Powered by an Organic Greens Blend (consisting of 5 essential leafy greens) and Superfoods complex (17 fruits and vegetables), Apple Blackcurrant Super Beauty Greens is a convenient and tasty way to meet your body's whole food nutrition needs for detox and immune support. 

And if all that doesn't sound impressive enough, every serving also stars:

  • 5,000mg Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
  • Natural Sea Mineral Complex
  • 6 stimulating, crash-proof Herbal Extracts
  • 4 gut-loving Prebiotics
  • 5 friendly bacteria boosting Probiotics (5.6 billion CFUs)
  • 5 digestion-easing Digestive Enzymes

Apple Blackcurrant Super Beauty Greens keeps things real with a natural low-calorie sweetener with zero impact on blood sugar levels and no artificial flavours.

Benefits

A greens powder that's so much more than greens. Of course, there are greens: 5 potent cleansing Organic Greens, to be exact. 

But they're also paired with Superfoods and a Natural Mineral Sea Complex to feed your body with a cocktail of sometimes hard-to-get nutrients for immune and overall well-being support. 

Bioactive Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides enhance skin's radiance and improve its overall appearance, nourish and strengthen nails, and boost hair's thickness and volume. 

The 3-in-1 symbiotic mix of Pre and Probiotics and Digestive Enzymes helps balance bacteria in the gut and allow optimal nutrient absorption — fortifying your digestive health. The result is sweet, sweet relief from occasional digestive upsets, such as bloating, gas, and discomfort. 

Lastly, kick your day up a notch with 6 natural, energising Herbal Extracts that'll help you knock off everything on your to-do list.

      Of particular importance for beauty and overall health is vitamin C, which may help protect against oxidative stress by scavenging destructive free radicals and stimulating the body's natural production of collagen, plus hyaluronic acid.

      These 4 prebiotic fibres aren't digestible by your body, so they travel down to your lower digestive tract relatively intact and become a crucial food source for your gut's friendly microorganisms.

entry.title: Strawberry Kiwi Super Beauty Greens - 308g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 65.00

Description

We've given the traditional (read: could-be-better) greens powder a massive upgrade. Formulated specifically for daily beauty, immune, digestion, and energy support, every serving of Strawberry Kiwi Super Beauty Greens packs a comprehensive functional, active stack of:

  • 5,000mg Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
  • 5 crucial, detoxifying Organic Greens
  • 17 nutrient-dense Superfoods
  • Natural Sea Mineral Complex for a wealth of calcium and trace minerals
  • 6 energising Herbal Extracts 
  • 4 microbiome-nourishing Prebiotics
  • 5 gut-friendly Probiotics (5.6 billion CFUs)
  • 5 bloat-deterring Digestive Enzymes

Naturally flavoured and sweetened with no added sugar for a spike-free wellness experience that'll have you feeling good down to the last sip.

Benefits

Strawberry Kiwi Super Beauty Greens is a more-in-one wellness solution that does it all.

It unites a blend of Organic Greens (such as Spirulina and Chlorella), antioxidant-rich Superfoods (from Blackcurrant to Elderberry to Broccoli Sprout), and Natural Sea Mineral Complex to support detoxification and immune health. 

Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides effortlessly refine the complexion plus provide serious TLC to hair and nails. 

What's more, Strawberry Kiwi Super Beauty Greens combines Pre and Probiotics and Digestive Enzymes to promote a balanced gut microbiome and support food breakdown, helping you extract the most nutrition from your diet while providing digestive comfort and alleviating the occasional bloating. 

Finally, a blend of herbal extracts, from L-theanine to Panax Ginseng, offers long-lasting energy that'll have you beating the afternoon slump and powering through your days — no matter how long they are.

Ingredients

    • Organic Greens Blend (Spirulina, Chlorella, Alfalfa Grass, Wheat Grass, Barley Grass)

entry.title: Passionfruit Mango Collagen Powder - 560g
entry.summary:
Vendor: thecollagen.co
Type:
Price: 79.00

 

Description

Ingestible beauty and wellness in every scoop. Leave dull skin, brittle hair and nails, troubled gut, and creaky joints behind with our potently anti-ageing Passionfruit Mango Collagen Powder. The proof is in what it contains: Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin. *Scoop included.

Benefits

Its wickedly good taste isn't the only thing going for our Passionfruit Mango Collagen Powder. 

There's also its list of powerful anti-ageing ingredients, each a youth elixir in its own right. First up, 15 grams of grass-fed, pasture-raised bioavailable Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides — a fast-acting do-it-all that revives depleted skin, hair, nails, joints, and gut to their former glory.

Then, a synergistic blend of Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin bolsters bovine collagen's glow-up effects:

  • Vitamin C promotes collagen production for smooth, plump skin
  • Hyaluronic Acid offers long-lasting, deep hydration for joints that move without protest
  • Biotin aids energy metabolism, ensuring healthier skin, hair, and nails

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins. 

  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract, Turmeric Powder) Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

 

Nutrition Information

 

Amino Acid Profile

 

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 400ml hot or cold water, fruit or your favourite smoothie and mix well. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better.

How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

How many serves per pack?

Each tin provides 28 servings, equivalent to 56 scoops, ensuring long-lasting use. If you consume once per day it will last you 28 days. Prepare to be amazed as each serving contains an impressive 15 grams of collagen, complemented by the benefits of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and Biotin. This comprehensive blend offers everything you need to enhance your beauty regimen, providing nourishment and support for radiant skin, hair, and nails, joints and gut health.

How much sugar per serve?

Indulge guilt-free in our Premium Collagen Peptides and our entire product range, as each serving is thoughtfully crafted to contain minimal to no sugar. Enjoy the delicious flavours of our Premium Collagen Peptides, knowing that each one contains less than 1g of sugar per serving, allowing you to prioritise your health and wellness without sacrificing taste.

entry.title: Immunity Collagen Peptides - Elderberry & Raspberry 208g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 45.00

 

 

Description

Equal parts tasty and effective. Our Immunity Collagen Peptides blends a wealth of vital, immunity-boosting nutrients to help Protect Your Glow. 

Beyond our hero ingredient, Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, there’s also Vitamin C, Vitamin A, Zinc, and Vitamin D. Ahh, just reading that made us feel sprightlier and better prepared for the stressful demands of modern life.

Benefits

Let's count the ways our Immunity Collagen Peptides lends a helping hand to your immune system:

  • One, 10 grams of 100% pure, grass-fed, pasture-raised Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides keep your skin — i.e., the first line of defence against bugs and infections — in tip-top condition. 
  • Two, the synergistic blend of Vitamin C and Vitamin A protects your white blood cells from oxidative damage.
  • Three, Zinc aids in the production of immune cells, like T-cells, that help ward off illness-inducing threats. 
  • Four, Vitamin D enhances the function of your immune cells. 

As if that wasn’t enough, our Immunity Collagen Peptides also support hair, nails, joints, and gut health.

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

The skin is our body’s first line of defence. Collagen peptides play an essential role in a healthy immune system by maintaining normal skin function and reducing inflammation in collagen rich tissues. Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Vitamin C

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres within the body. Vitamin C also supports the function of various immune cells and enhances their ability to protect against infection.

  • Zinc

A mineral that is needed for immune cell development and plays an important role in the reduction of inflammatory responses within the body.

  • Vitamin A

An important micronutrient that plays a vital role in maintaining your body’s natural defences against illness and infection. It may also assist with the health of vital organs such as your eyes, lungs, and gut.

  • Vitamin D3

Known to enhance the function of immune cells that may protect the body against pathogens.

  • Natural Flavours, Erythritol, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract, Spirulina Extract) Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

 

Nutrition Information

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Not suitable for persons under 15 years of age. If you have a medical condition, are pregnant or considering becoming pregnant, do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or health professional.

 

How to Use

Blend 1 serving (2 scoops) of Immunity Collagen Peptides into 300-350ml water. Add powder first for best mixability.

1-2 servings per day. Take one serving at a time, at the first sign of common cold symptoms. Do not exceed recommended daily dose. 

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

entry.title: Mixed Berry Collagen Powder - 560g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 79.00

Description

The ultimate saviour for hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut that need a little (or a lot of) TLC. 

Our Premium Collagen Peptides feature a line-up of incredibly hardworking anti-ageing ingredients — Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin — granting you a one-way ticket to radiant skin, stronger hair and nails, mobile joints, and a balanced gut microbiome. *Scoop included.

Benefits

Not your average collagen powder. Beyond its berry mouthwatering taste, our Premium Collagen Peptides prove they're head and shoulders above others with its powerhouse, glow-giving formula. 

15 grams of pure, grass-fed, and pasture-raised Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides — designed for your body to absorb in a flash, stimulating inside-out renewal for enviably healthier hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut.

And, of course, it doesn’t stop there. Our collagen peptides also unite a transformative blend of:

  • Free radical-fighting Vitamin C 
  • Hydration-sealing Hyaluronic Acid
  • Energy-metabolism-supporting Biotin

Kiss dullness, lifelessness, and achiness goodbye … and trade that in for pillow-soft skin, shiny hair and skin, resilient joints, a happy gut, and more.

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins. 

  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract, Spirulina Extract) Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

 

Nutrition Information

 

Amino Acid Profile

 

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 400ml hot or cold water, fruit or your favourite smoothie and mix well. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better.

How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

Each tin provides 28 servings, equivalent to 56 scoops, ensuring long-lasting use. If you consume once per day it will last you 28 days. This comprehensive blend offers everything you need to enhance your beauty regimen, providing nourishment and support for radiant skin, hair, and nails, joints and gut health.

Versatility isn’t our Unflavoured Collagen Powder’s only winning trait. There’s also efficacy — thanks to its highly-targeted and generous dosing of Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin. 

With this supercharged blend working to help your hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut get their glow on … premature ageing and “bad” gut bacteria won’t stand a chance. *Scoop included.

Benefits

Your anti-ageing routine made easy. Our Premium Collagen Peptides deliver 15 grams of potent Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides per serving — revitalising you from head to toe for your healthiest hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut yet. 

More reasons to love our collagen peptides? We can think of 3. One: they’re grass-fed and pasture-raised. Two: they're tiny (less than 2 kDa on average), so they get absorbed and work fast.

Finally: they’re packed with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin:

Amino Acid

How to enjoy it?

Add 1 serving (2 levelled scoops) to coffee, tea, oats or your favourite smoothie on the daily. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better. Can also be baked into cakes or biscuits for a delicious collagen snack.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Discover the boundless versatility of our unflavored Premium Collagen Peptides, designed to seamlessly integrate into any aspect of your day. Effortlessly incorporate it into your routine by adding it to coffee, tea, juice, smoothies, baked goods, or any other creation your heart desires. With its flexibility, our Premium Collagen Peptides effortlessly adapts to your preferences, allowing you to enjoy the benefits in a way that suits your unique taste and lifestyle.
